title: Coronavirus en Argentina: se confirmaron 35 muertes y 1958 contagios en las últimas 24 horas - infobae
description: El Ministerio de Salud informó que la cantidad de casos en todo el país llegó a 37.510. La mayor cantidad de infectados se encuentra en el AMBA. Es el número más alto de contagios en una jornada

title: Warum der Grippe-Impfstoff heuer knapp werden könnte - KURIER
description: Experten befürchten Engpass. Auch Corona könnte Auswirkungen auf die Influenza-Saison haben.

title: Britain abandons coronavirus tracing after app failures - Sky News Australia
description: The British government has abandoned its coronavirus tracing app after technical issues significantly reduced the effectiveness of the app. The Department of...

title: Coronavirus: le groupe sanguin participe à déterminer la virulence de la maladie, selon une étude allemande - l'avenir.net
description: Des scientifiques allemands ont découvert que le groupe sanguin d’une personne peut définir dans quelle mesure le Covid-19, la maladie respiratoire potentiellement mortelle causée par le nouveau coronavirus, nuit à la santé d’une personne.

title: Brasil tem 1.204 mortes por coronavírus em 24 horas, mostra consórcio de veículos de imprensa; são 47.869 no total - G1
description: Pelo 3º dia consecutivo, país tem mais de 1,2 mil mortes no período de 24 horas; é apenas a segunda vez que isso ocorre desde o início da pandemia. Região Sudeste concentra quase metade do total de óbitos.

title: Britain abandons coronavirus tracing after app failures - Sky News Australia
description: The British government has abandoned its coronavirus tracing app after technical issues significantly reduced the effectiveness of the app. The Department of...

title: Leiter Task-Force ist besorgt – «Die zweite Welle könnte schon früher als im Herbst kommen» - Schweizer Radio und Fernsehen (SRF)
description: Die Corona-Fallzahlen in der Schweiz steigen wieder an. Im Fokus steht nun die Bekämpfung von lokalen Infektionsherden.

title: Coronavirus también les quitó (por ahora) este sueño de toda la vida a muchos colombianos - Pulzo.com
description: Una encuesta de TransUnion reveló que al 26 % de los colombianos que iban a comprar casa les tocó posponer el gasto por la crisis del COVID-19.

title: MINSAP confirma un fallecido por coronavirus en Cuba y 15 nuevos contagios - CiberCuba
description: El Ministerio de Salud Pública confirmó este jueves una nueva defunción por COVID-19 en Cuba.

title: Covid-19 - Welche Rolle spielen Aerosol-Partikel bei der Übertragung des Coronavirus? - Deutschlandfunk
description: Das neue Coronavirus wird unter anderem über die Tröpfcheninfektion verbreitet - da ist sich die Wissenschaft einig. Neue Erkenntnisse rücken aber auch sogenannte Aerosol-Partikel, kleine Schwebeteile in der Luft, in den Fokus. Der Berliner Virologe Christian…

title: Coronavirus : Cinq cas positifs au sein de l'AS Saint-Etienne, dont trois joueurs - 20 Minutes
description: Le club de Ligue 1 annonce avoir dépisté cinq cas positifs au Covid-19 grâce à une campagne de dépistage

title: Coronavirus UK: Frontline staff and over-50s first in line for vaccine - Metro.co.uk
description: It is still not known whether a safe and effective vaccine will be developed.

title: China Berjibaku Cegah Gelombang Kedua Virus Corona - detikNews
description: China memberlakukan kembali pembatasan perjalanan setelah sebelumnya mencabut status lockdown. Hal itu dilakukan untuk mencegah gelombang kedua virus Corona.

title: Early open of hairdressers, barbers expected in Phase 3 - RTE.ie
description: The Cabinet will meet tomorrow to discuss recommendations from the National Public Health Emergency Team on Phase 3 of the easing of coronavirus restrictions, scheduled for 29 June.

title: Imperial College London Begins First Human Trials of New Self-Amplifying RNA COVID-19 Vaccine - HospiMedica
description: A new coronavirus vaccine developed by researchers at the Imperial College London (London, UK) is all set to enter human clinical trials for the first time.

title: Coronavirus, Brasile: un milione di casi. Msf: «Incubo fuori controllo» - Corriere della Sera
description: Amazzonia e favelas le aree più colpite. Gli indigeni non hanno accesso alle cure: morto di Covid-19 anche il loro capo storico Paulinho Paiakan

title: 77 nouveaux cas de Covid-19 au Maroc: la répartition par région - Le Site Info le site d'information au Maroc
description: 77 nouveaux cas d'infection au coronavirus (Covid-19) et 48 guérisons ont été enregistrées au Maroc au cours des dernières 24 heures.

title: Peso pierde 2.04% contra el dólar por temor a una nueva ola de coronavirus - El Economista
description: Las preocupaciones ante la posibilidad de un rebrote de coronavirus por nuevas cifras de contagios en China y en algunas zonas de Estados Unidos encienden las alertas. El tipo de cambio conlcuyó esta jornada en 22.7270 unidades, con un movimiento de 45.50 cen…

title: Oil extends drop on US stockpiles build and China virus fear - The Star Online
description: OIL dropped for a second day after a bigger-than-expected build in U.S. crude inventories worsened sentiment in a market already nervous about the potential for a second coronavirus wave in China.

title: Coronavirus May Also Harm Patients Without Symptoms - Somag News
description: According to the researchers, although there are currently no symptoms, there are many patients with coronavirus in their body. According to recent studies, it has been discovered that coronavirus can harm even these patients, albeit minor. There are many rea…

title: Coronanieuws: Militairen kazerne Oirschot in thuisisolatie vanwege mogelijke coronabesmettingen - Omroep Brabant
description: In dit liveblog houden we je donderdag op de hoogte van het laatste nieuws rond de coronacrisis.

title: Slik blir boliglånet: Norges Bank venter at bankene kutter mer - E24
description: Norges Bank har kuttet renten med 1,50 prosentpoeng siden starten av coronakrisen, men bankene har foreløpig ikke latt boliglånskundene få like stort avslag. Normalisering i pengemarkedet kan åpne for enda billigere lån.

title: Covid 19 coronavirus: Thirteen-day-old baby dies in the UK after contracting the coronavirus - New Zealand Herald
description: The newborn is the youngest known victim in the UK.

title: Blood type, genes tied to risk of severe COVID-19: European study - ABS-CBN News
description: A person's blood type and other genetic factors may be linked with severity of coronavirus infection, according to European researchers looking for further clues about why COVID-19 hits some so much harder than others.

title: Médico morreu com covid-19 no Hospital de S. José - PÚBLICO
description: É o primeiro caso conhecido de uma morte com a infecção pelo novo coronavírus neste grupo profissional.

title: Trump lansează acuzaţii dure la adresa Chinei: Coronavirusul, un atac „intenţionat” pentru a distruge - Mediafax
description: Donald Trump crede că Beijingul ar fi putut încuraja răspândirea epidemiei de coronavirus la nivel internaţional, pentru destabilizarea economiilor competitive. Preşedintele SUA: "Există şansa să fi fost intenţionat". Liderul SUA a subliniat că nu există info…

title: Millions Of Hydroxychloroquine Pills That Trump Touted For COVID-19 Are Now In Limbo - HuffPost
description: Health officials are unsure what to do with stockpiles of the drug and the related chloroquine after the FDA declared them risky and likely ineffective to treat coronavirus.

title: Donald Trump håller massmöte – trots corona-varningar - Aftonbladet
description: Konserter är inställda. Idrottsevenemang spelas inför tomma läktare.  Smittskyddsmyndigheten i USA avråder från stora möten. Det hindrar inte president Trump från att i helgen ordna ett valmöte där mer än 19 000 anhängare ska samlas. Men bara de som godkänner…

title: US lawmakers, official clash on China’s role in Covid-19 vaccine development - South China Morning Post
description: General Gustave Perna indicated an unwillingness to work with China on developing coronavirus vaccines or therapeutics during a hearing with the Senate Armed Services Committee.

title: 18 Haziran corona virüsü tablosu! İşte vaka sayısında son durum… - Sözcü
description: Son dakika corona virüsünde vaka sayıları belli oldu. Sağlık Bakanı Fahrettin Koca, her gün olduğu gibi bugün de günlük vaka ve can kaybı verilerinin yer aldığı corona virüsü tablosunu yayımladı. Özellikle son günlerde yaşanan artışın ardından vatandaşlar kor…

title: California Gov. Newsom Makes Face Masks Mandatory Amid Rising Coronavirus Cases - NPR
description: The new order, issued Thursday, requires people to wear masks or other face coverings in public spaces, including while taking public transportation, seeking medical care or shopping.

title: ¿Qué es la dexametasona, el nuevo tratamiento 'milagroso'? - RFI Español
description: Mientras que la epidemia de coronavirus está infectando a cada día más gente, por primera vez esta semana un ensayo clínico a gran escala parece haber dado resultados positivos. Los promotores de Recovery, llevado a cabo en el Reino Unido, anunciaron haber ob…

title: Heavy coronavirus traces found in seafood, meat sections of Beijing food market - EWN
description: The latest outbreak infected more than 100 people and raised fears of wider contagion in China.

description: Experten befürchten Engpass. Auch Corona könnte Auswirkungen auf die Influenza-Saison haben.

title: Britain abandons coronavirus tracing after app failures - Sky News Australia
description: The British government has abandoned its coronavirus tracing app after technical issues significantly reduced the effectiveness of the app. The Department of...

title: Coronavirus: le groupe sanguin participe à déterminer la virulence de la maladie, selon une étude allemande - l'avenir.net
description: Des scientifiques allemands ont découvert que le groupe sanguin d’une personne peut définir dans quelle mesure le Covid-19, la maladie respiratoire potentiellement mortelle causée par le nouveau coronavirus, nuit à la santé d’une personne.

title: Brasil tem 1.204 mortes por coronavírus em 24 horas, mostra consórcio de veículos de imprensa; são 47.869 no total - G1
description: Pelo 3º dia consecutivo, país tem mais de 1,2 mil mortes no período de 24 horas; é apenas a segunda vez que isso ocorre desde o início da pandemia. Região Sudeste concentra quase metade do total de óbitos.

title: Britain abandons coronavirus tracing after app failures - Sky News Australia
description: The British government has abandoned its coronavirus tracing app after technical issues significantly reduced the effectiveness of the app. The Department of...

title: Leiter Task-Force ist besorgt – «Die zweite Welle könnte schon früher als im Herbst kommen» - Schweizer Radio und Fernsehen (SRF)
description: Die Corona-Fallzahlen in der Schweiz steigen wieder an. Im Fokus steht nun die Bekämpfung von lokalen Infektionsherden.

title: Coronavirus también les quitó (por ahora) este sueño de toda la vida a muchos colombianos - Pulzo.com
description: Una encuesta de TransUnion reveló que al 26 % de los colombianos que iban a comprar casa les tocó posponer el gasto por la crisis del COVID-19.

title: MINSAP confirma un fallecido por coronavirus en Cuba y 15 nuevos contagios - CiberCuba
description: El Ministerio de Salud Pública confirmó este jueves una nueva defunción por COVID-19 en Cuba.

title: Covid-19 - Welche Rolle spielen Aerosol-Partikel bei der Übertragung des Coronavirus? - Deutschlandfunk
description: Das neue Coronavirus wird unter anderem über die Tröpfcheninfektion verbreitet - da ist sich die Wissenschaft einig. Neue Erkenntnisse rücken aber auch sogenannte Aerosol-Partikel, kleine Schwebeteile in der Luft, in den Fokus. Der Berliner Virologe Christian…

title: Coronavirus : Cinq cas positifs au sein de l'AS Saint-Etienne, dont trois joueurs - 20 Minutes
description: Le club de Ligue 1 annonce avoir dépisté cinq cas positifs au Covid-19 grâce à une campagne de dépistage

title: Coronavirus UK: Frontline staff and over-50s first in line for vaccine - Metro.co.uk
description: It is still not known whether a safe and effective vaccine will be developed.

title: China Berjibaku Cegah Gelombang Kedua Virus Corona - detikNews
description: China memberlakukan kembali pembatasan perjalanan setelah sebelumnya mencabut status lockdown. Hal itu dilakukan untuk mencegah gelombang kedua virus Corona.

title: Early open of hairdressers, barbers expected in Phase 3 - RTE.ie
description: The Cabinet will meet tomorrow to discuss recommendations from the National Public Health Emergency Team on Phase 3 of the easing of coronavirus restrictions, scheduled for 29 June.

title: Imperial College London Begins First Human Trials of New Self-Amplifying RNA COVID-19 Vaccine - HospiMedica
description: A new coronavirus vaccine developed by researchers at the Imperial College London (London, UK) is all set to enter human clinical trials for the first time.

title: Coronavirus, Brasile: un milione di casi. Msf: «Incubo fuori controllo» - Corriere della Sera
description: Amazzonia e favelas le aree più colpite. Gli indigeni non hanno accesso alle cure: morto di Covid-19 anche il loro capo storico Paulinho Paiakan

title: 77 nouveaux cas de Covid-19 au Maroc: la répartition par région - Le Site Info le site d'information au Maroc
description: 77 nouveaux cas d'infection au coronavirus (Covid-19) et 48 guérisons ont été enregistrées au Maroc au cours des dernières 24 heures.

title: Peso pierde 2.04% contra el dólar por temor a una nueva ola de coronavirus - El Economista
description: Las preocupaciones ante la posibilidad de un rebrote de coronavirus por nuevas cifras de contagios en China y en algunas zonas de Estados Unidos encienden las alertas. El tipo de cambio conlcuyó esta jornada en 22.7270 unidades, con un movimiento de 45.50 cen…

title: Oil extends drop on US stockpiles build and China virus fear - The Star Online
description: OIL dropped for a second day after a bigger-than-expected build in U.S. crude inventories worsened sentiment in a market already nervous about the potential for a second coronavirus wave in China.

title: Coronavirus May Also Harm Patients Without Symptoms - Somag News
description: According to the researchers, although there are currently no symptoms, there are many patients with coronavirus in their body. According to recent studies, it has been discovered that coronavirus can harm even these patients, albeit minor. There are many rea…

title: Coronanieuws: Militairen kazerne Oirschot in thuisisolatie vanwege mogelijke coronabesmettingen - Omroep Brabant
description: In dit liveblog houden we je donderdag op de hoogte van het laatste nieuws rond de coronacrisis.

title: Slik blir boliglånet: Norges Bank venter at bankene kutter mer - E24
description: Norges Bank har kuttet renten med 1,50 prosentpoeng siden starten av coronakrisen, men bankene har foreløpig ikke latt boliglånskundene få like stort avslag. Normalisering i pengemarkedet kan åpne for enda billigere lån.

title: Covid 19 coronavirus: Thirteen-day-old baby dies in the UK after contracting the coronavirus - New Zealand Herald
description: The newborn is the youngest known victim in the UK.

title: Blood type, genes tied to risk of severe COVID-19: European study - ABS-CBN News
description: A person's blood type and other genetic factors may be linked with severity of coronavirus infection, according to European researchers looking for further clues about why COVID-19 hits some so much harder than others.

title: Médico morreu com covid-19 no Hospital de S. José - PÚBLICO
description: É o primeiro caso conhecido de uma morte com a infecção pelo novo coronavírus neste grupo profissional.

title: Trump lansează acuzaţii dure la adresa Chinei: Coronavirusul, un atac „intenţionat” pentru a distruge - Mediafax
description: Donald Trump crede că Beijingul ar fi putut încuraja răspândirea epidemiei de coronavirus la nivel internaţional, pentru destabilizarea economiilor competitive. Preşedintele SUA: "Există şansa să fi fost intenţionat". Liderul SUA a subliniat că nu există info…

title: Millions Of Hydroxychloroquine Pills That Trump Touted For COVID-19 Are Now In Limbo - HuffPost
description: Health officials are unsure what to do with stockpiles of the drug and the related chloroquine after the FDA declared them risky and likely ineffective to treat coronavirus.

title: Donald Trump håller massmöte – trots corona-varningar - Aftonbladet
description: Konserter är inställda. Idrottsevenemang spelas inför tomma läktare.  Smittskyddsmyndigheten i USA avråder från stora möten. Det hindrar inte president Trump från att i helgen ordna ett valmöte där mer än 19 000 anhängare ska samlas. Men bara de som godkänner…

title: US lawmakers, official clash on China’s role in Covid-19 vaccine development - South China Morning Post
description: General Gustave Perna indicated an unwillingness to work with China on developing coronavirus vaccines or therapeutics during a hearing with the Senate Armed Services Committee.

title: 18 Haziran corona virüsü tablosu! İşte vaka sayısında son durum… - Sözcü
description: Son dakika corona virüsünde vaka sayıları belli oldu. Sağlık Bakanı Fahrettin Koca, her gün olduğu gibi bugün de günlük vaka ve can kaybı verilerinin yer aldığı corona virüsü tablosunu yayımladı. Özellikle son günlerde yaşanan artışın ardından vatandaşlar kor…

title: California Gov. Newsom Makes Face Masks Mandatory Amid Rising Coronavirus Cases - NPR
description: The new order, issued Thursday, requires people to wear masks or other face coverings in public spaces, including while taking public transportation, seeking medical care or shopping.

title: Coronavirus: le groupe sanguin participe à déterminer la virulence de la maladie, selon une étude allemande - l'avenir.net
description: Des scientifiques allemands ont découvert que le groupe sanguin d’une personne peut définir dans quelle mesure le Covid-19, la maladie respiratoire potentiellement mortelle causée par le nouveau coronavirus, nuit à la santé d’une personne.

title: Brasil tem 1.204 mortes por coronavírus em 24 horas, mostra consórcio de veículos de imprensa; são 47.869 no total - G1
description: Pelo 3º dia consecutivo, país tem mais de 1,2 mil mortes no período de 24 horas; é apenas a segunda vez que isso ocorre desde o início da pandemia. Região Sudeste concentra quase metade do total de óbitos.

title: Britain abandons coronavirus tracing after app failures - Sky News Australia
description: The British government has abandoned its coronavirus tracing app after technical issues significantly reduced the effectiveness of the app. The Department of...

title: Leiter Task-Force ist besorgt – «Die zweite Welle könnte schon früher als im Herbst kommen» - Schweizer Radio und Fernsehen (SRF)
description: Die Corona-Fallzahlen in der Schweiz steigen wieder an. Im Fokus steht nun die Bekämpfung von lokalen Infektionsherden.

title: Coronavirus también les quitó (por ahora) este sueño de toda la vida a muchos colombianos - Pulzo.com
description: Una encuesta de TransUnion reveló que al 26 % de los colombianos que iban a comprar casa les tocó posponer el gasto por la crisis del COVID-19.

title: MINSAP confirma un fallecido por coronavirus en Cuba y 15 nuevos contagios - CiberCuba
description: El Ministerio de Salud Pública confirmó este jueves una nueva defunción por COVID-19 en Cuba.

title: Covid-19 - Welche Rolle spielen Aerosol-Partikel bei der Übertragung des Coronavirus? - Deutschlandfunk
description: Das neue Coronavirus wird unter anderem über die Tröpfcheninfektion verbreitet - da ist sich die Wissenschaft einig. Neue Erkenntnisse rücken aber auch sogenannte Aerosol-Partikel, kleine Schwebeteile in der Luft, in den Fokus. Der Berliner Virologe Christian…

title: Coronavirus : Cinq cas positifs au sein de l'AS Saint-Etienne, dont trois joueurs - 20 Minutes
description: Le club de Ligue 1 annonce avoir dépisté cinq cas positifs au Covid-19 grâce à une campagne de dépistage

title: Coronavirus UK: Frontline staff and over-50s first in line for vaccine - Metro.co.uk
description: It is still not known whether a safe and effective vaccine will be developed.

title: China Berjibaku Cegah Gelombang Kedua Virus Corona - detikNews
description: China memberlakukan kembali pembatasan perjalanan setelah sebelumnya mencabut status lockdown. Hal itu dilakukan untuk mencegah gelombang kedua virus Corona.

title: Early open of hairdressers, barbers expected in Phase 3 - RTE.ie
description: The Cabinet will meet tomorrow to discuss recommendations from the National Public Health Emergency Team on Phase 3 of the easing of coronavirus restrictions, scheduled for 29 June.

title: Imperial College London Begins First Human Trials of New Self-Amplifying RNA COVID-19 Vaccine - HospiMedica
description: A new coronavirus vaccine developed by researchers at the Imperial College London (London, UK) is all set to enter human clinical trials for the first time.

title: Coronavirus, Brasile: un milione di casi. Msf: «Incubo fuori controllo» - Corriere della Sera
description: Amazzonia e favelas le aree più colpite. Gli indigeni non hanno accesso alle cure: morto di Covid-19 anche il loro capo storico Paulinho Paiakan

title: 77 nouveaux cas de Covid-19 au Maroc: la répartition par région - Le Site Info le site d'information au Maroc
description: 77 nouveaux cas d'infection au coronavirus (Covid-19) et 48 guérisons ont été enregistrées au Maroc au cours des dernières 24 heures.

title: Peso pierde 2.04% contra el dólar por temor a una nueva ola de coronavirus - El Economista
description: Las preocupaciones ante la posibilidad de un rebrote de coronavirus por nuevas cifras de contagios en China y en algunas zonas de Estados Unidos encienden las alertas. El tipo de cambio conlcuyó esta jornada en 22.7270 unidades, con un movimiento de 45.50 cen…

title: Oil extends drop on US stockpiles build and China virus fear - The Star Online
description: OIL dropped for a second day after a bigger-than-expected build in U.S. crude inventories worsened sentiment in a market already nervous about the potential for a second coronavirus wave in China.

title: Coronavirus May Also Harm Patients Without Symptoms - Somag News
description: According to the researchers, although there are currently no symptoms, there are many patients with coronavirus in their body. According to recent studies, it has been discovered that coronavirus can harm even these patients, albeit minor. There are many rea…

title: Coronanieuws: Militairen kazerne Oirschot in thuisisolatie vanwege mogelijke coronabesmettingen - Omroep Brabant
description: In dit liveblog houden we je donderdag op de hoogte van het laatste nieuws rond de coronacrisis.

title: Slik blir boliglånet: Norges Bank venter at bankene kutter mer - E24
description: Norges Bank har kuttet renten med 1,50 prosentpoeng siden starten av coronakrisen, men bankene har foreløpig ikke latt boliglånskundene få like stort avslag. Normalisering i pengemarkedet kan åpne for enda billigere lån.

title: Covid 19 coronavirus: Thirteen-day-old baby dies in the UK after contracting the coronavirus - New Zealand Herald
description: The newborn is the youngest known victim in the UK.

title: Blood type, genes tied to risk of severe COVID-19: European study - ABS-CBN News
description: A person's blood type and other genetic factors may be linked with severity of coronavirus infection, according to European researchers looking for further clues about why COVID-19 hits some so much harder than others.

title: Médico morreu com covid-19 no Hospital de S. José - PÚBLICO
description: É o primeiro caso conhecido de uma morte com a infecção pelo novo coronavírus neste grupo profissional.

title: Trump lansează acuzaţii dure la adresa Chinei: Coronavirusul, un atac „intenţionat” pentru a distruge - Mediafax
description: Donald Trump crede că Beijingul ar fi putut încuraja răspândirea epidemiei de coronavirus la nivel internaţional, pentru destabilizarea economiilor competitive. Preşedintele SUA: "Există şansa să fi fost intenţionat". Liderul SUA a subliniat că nu există info…

title: Millions Of Hydroxychloroquine Pills That Trump Touted For COVID-19 Are Now In Limbo - HuffPost
description: Health officials are unsure what to do with stockpiles of the drug and the related chloroquine after the FDA declared them risky and likely ineffective to treat coronavirus.

title: Donald Trump håller massmöte – trots corona-varningar - Aftonbladet
description: Konserter är inställda. Idrottsevenemang spelas inför tomma läktare.  Smittskyddsmyndigheten i USA avråder från stora möten. Det hindrar inte president Trump från att i helgen ordna ett valmöte där mer än 19 000 anhängare ska samlas. Men bara de som godkänner…

title: US lawmakers, official clash on China’s role in Covid-19 vaccine development - South China Morning Post
description: General Gustave Perna indicated an unwillingness to work with China on developing coronavirus vaccines or therapeutics during a hearing with the Senate Armed Services Committee.

title: 18 Haziran corona virüsü tablosu! İşte vaka sayısında son durum… - Sözcü
description: Son dakika corona virüsünde vaka sayıları belli oldu. Sağlık Bakanı Fahrettin Koca, her gün olduğu gibi bugün de günlük vaka ve can kaybı verilerinin yer aldığı corona virüsü tablosunu yayımladı. Özellikle son günlerde yaşanan artışın ardından vatandaşlar kor…

title: California Gov. Newsom Makes Face Masks Mandatory Amid Rising Coronavirus Cases - NPR
description: The new order, issued Thursday, requires people to wear masks or other face coverings in public spaces, including while taking public transportation, seeking medical care or shopping.

title: Heavy coronavirus traces found in seafood, meat sections of Beijing food market - EWN
description: The latest outbreak infected more than 100 people and raised fears of wider contagion in China.
